entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
